article.title: Boeing Supports Electronic Warfare Aircraft
article.text: The Boeing Co., St. Louis, Mo., is being awarded $22,401,663 for cost-plus-fixed-fee, delivery order 0166 against a previously issued basic ordering agreement (N00019-11-G-0001) for supplies and services to support follow-on test and evaluation of the F/-18 E/F and EA-18G aircraft. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Md., is the contracting activity.
